description: Purchase of Zero Turn Mower for FBFC NHS. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is May 1, 2024.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Purchase of Zero Turn Mower for FBFC NHS
#### CB No.: cb-6780-82117137, Solicitation No.: 5P300-23-0040/A

**Tender Details**
* **Publication Date**: June 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 31, 2023, 2:00 PM (ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2024

**Buying Authority**
* **Contracting Entity**: Parks Canada
* **Contracting Entity Contact**: Eric Robinson
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 2A1
	+ Phone: (873) 355-0824
	+ Email: [eric.robinson@pc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.robinson@pc.gc.ca)

**Procurement Details**
* **Contract Title**: Purchase of Zero Turn Mower for FBFC NHS
* **UNSPSC Code**: 21101701 (Mowers)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Bidder Requirements**
* This bid solicitation is only open to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-18MOWR/B.
* Bidders must refer to: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-75734](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-75734) if they wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA.

**Delivery and Debriefing Details**
* The requested delivery date for the goods is May 1, 2024.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
* The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person. 
Note: I removed a lot of unnecessary information such as the date of modification, regions of opportunity, and regions of delivery. These are all irrelevant to the core of the tender announcement. I also reorganized the information to flow in a more
